name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Screen Wizard â€“ Screen Recorder & Capture Tool

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Record your screen, capture high-quality screenshots, and create professional videos with ease.

long.ar,es,hi,ru,zh_CN: This extension allows users to record audio and video, take full-page screenshots, capture specific screen areas. It is designed to provide a flexible and easy-to-use solution for all recording and screenshot needs, whether it's for work, presentations, or personal use.
long.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Screen Wizard is the ultimate tool for recording your screen and capturing high-quality screenshots with ease. Whether you're creating tutorials, recording presentations, or sharing video messages, Screen Wizard provides all the tools you need to make your content stand out.

- Record your screen: Capture your entire screen or a specific window with high-quality video recording.
- Capture screenshots: Quickly take screenshots of your screen with customizable options.
- Webcam recording: Record videos with your webcam alongside your screen capture for personalized content.
- Shareable content: Export your recordings and share them directly with others, making collaboration simple.

Install Screen Wizard today and start creating professional-looking videos and screenshots in minutes!
